name: EncoreMultimedia/core-wordpress
description: Project template for WordPress projects with composer

suggest.wpackagist-plugin/adminimize: ^1.11.4; Allows admin to control what admin menu items are visible to certain users/roles

suggest.wpackagist-plugin/duplicate-post: ^3.2; adds the ability to clone posts/pages/etc.

suggest.wpackagist-plugin/user-role-editor: ^4.40; allows editing of role permissions and addition of new roles
suggest.wpackagist-plugin/user-switching: ^1.4.0; lets admins impersonate another user account
suggest.wpackagist-plugin/wp-cfm: ^1.4.5; lets you copy configuration to/from the filesystem; similar to Drupal Features
